channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-7963] HBase VerifyReplication not working when security enabled
item.description:
When security is enabled, HBase VerifyReplication fails for two reasons:
1.MapReduce do not have the auth to read the replication paths "/hbase/replication/*" on ZK;
2.VerifyReplication does not get the token for slave cluster, it's different from HBASE-7442, this VerifyReplication does not have the output.

item.environment: Security is enabled on both clusters and all principals are in the same realm.
item.summary: HBase VerifyReplication not working when security enabled

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Here the initial patch posted for review.

The patch works well on secure hbase cluster.

But there is no method : waitForZKConnectionIfAuthenticating in ZKUtil in 0.94 code base. I remove that line and it also works.
Add some warn logs and remove the line waitForZKConnectionIfAuthenticating

Could you please explain a bit more why this is needed:


-    ZKUtil.createWithParents(this.zookeeper, this.peersZNode);

+    ZKUtil.createWithParentsIfNotExists(this.zookeeper, this.peersZNode);

Is this because of (1) above?
Yes, Enis Soztutar. It's just because that when security enabled, MR do not have the auth to read the replication paths "/hbase/replication/*" on ZK;
That is strange. Are you saying that on znode creation, if we do not have permission, but the node is there, we are not getting NodeExistsException in createWithParents()?

Hi Enis Soztutar, we can see the codes in the function createWithParents as below: 

zkw.getRecoverableZooKeeper().create(znode, new byte[0], createACL(zkw, znode),

          CreateMode.PERSISTENT);

    } catch(KeeperException.NodeExistsException nee) {

      return;

Here as we do not have the write permission, so before we get the NodeExistsException, the call of create faild in advance.

Changed the code to fetch the ZooKeeper Address of the peer in createSubmittableJob(), and then pass it to the map() as conf property.
This avoid the zookeeper call from the mapper, and the necessity to open the ACLs for the replication znodes.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12626285/HBASE-7963-v2.patch
against trunk revision .
ATTACHMENT ID: 12626285

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

+1 hadoop1.0. The patch compiles against the hadoop 1.0 profile.

+1 hadoop1.1. The patch compiles against the hadoop 1.1 profile.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

+1 lineLengths. The patch does not introduce lines longer than 100

+1 site. The mvn site goal succeeds with this patch.

-1 core tests. The patch failed these unit tests:

-1 core zombie tests. There are 1 zombie test(s): at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.encoding.TestEncodedSeekers.testEncodedSeeker(TestEncodedSeekers.java:129)

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/8566//testReport/
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/8566//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-hadoop2-compat.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/8566//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-prefix-tree.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/8566//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-client.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/8566//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-common.html

Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/8566//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-hadoop-compat.html
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/8566//console

This message is automatically generated.
+1, please add javadoc to initCredentialsForCluster on commit.
+1 for trunk and 0.98
